data.text: Awurade, misu frɛ wo, bra me nkyɛn ntɛm so.
Ma me mpaebɔ mmra wʼanim sɛ aduhuam;
Mma wɔnntwe me koma nnkɔ nea ɛyɛ bɔne ho,
Ma ɔtreneeni mmɔ me, ɛyɛ ayamye;
Wɔbɛtow wɔn sodifo afi ɔbotan so abɛhwe fam;
Wɔbɛka se, “Sɛnea obi funtum na otutu asase no,
Nanso Otumfo Awurade, mʼani wɔ wo so;
Bɔ me ho ban fi mfiri a wɔasunsum me no ho,
Ma amumɔyɛfo no ankasa ɔtan nyi wɔn,
